post.text: "You want to give me a good send off? Go vote!" —President Obama hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Jesse
comment.text: The Hillary movement is decent and equal and happening now. Vote and stop all that Trump represents and his hateful followers. Who need their mouths washed with soap.
